responses.rationale: Factual reporting of cases, slaughter numbers, and expert concern without explicit alarmist or reassuring framing.
Factual description of disease transmission pathway without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of deaths and location, citing a source, without explicit framing cues.
Contains a vivid verb ('swept through') describing the disease's impact, triggering an Alarmist cue (Q2).
A question, not a statement containing framing cues.
Contains explicit reassuring language ('symptoms...have been mild'), triggering a Reassuring cue (Q5).
Factual report of case context (location, contact type) without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of affected group without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of outbreak scale and human cases, citing source, without explicit framing cues.
Factual description of potential transmission to other species without explicit framing cues.
Factual definition and description of the virus and its primary spread without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of case numbers, citing source, without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of a new outbreak and location, citing source, without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of numbers, locations, and source, citing authority, without explicit framing cues.
Factual statement about differential risk for a specific group without explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit reassuring language ('risk...remains low'), triggering a Reassuring cue (Q5).
Factual report of a past event, location, and exposure type without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of case numbers, locations, and symptoms without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of case numbers, locations, and timeframe without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of case number, location, and exposure type, citing sources, without explicit framing cues.
Factual report of case number, link, and source without explicit framing cues.
Contains explicit reassuring language ('risk...is considered to be low'), triggering a Reassuring cue (Q5).
Factual description of geographic spread and affected populations/numbers without explicit framing cues.
